transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, mai Nidhi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. 
Customer: Ha boliye boliye.
Executive: Ji ji sir aapne screenshot share nahi kare jo hamari kal baat hui thi.
Customer: Kon sa wala screenshot aapko share karna hai abhi?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Maine aapko wo maine aapko bola tha ki wo screenshot mujhe yaad nahi hai kaise karunga jab jab yaad rahega tab mai karunga. Jo jo aap usi tarah aane ka abhi abhi koi aur aayega mere paas aise hi lekar mai aapko screenshot de dunga fir.
Executive: Sir abhi sir aapke do teen lead to aapne consume kari hogi na aaj kal mein bhi. Pehle to aapka theek aa raha tha.
Customer: Abhi jo aaj kal kar raha hu ab nahi hai agar hota to mai aapko leta abhi. Abhi aap usko kam se kam check kar aaiye jo aapne check kiya tha maine aapko liya tha complaint kiya tha uske aapke complaint piche se.
Executive: Aapke complaint piche se shor bahut aa raha hai thoda ek area mein aa sakte hai jaha pe shanti si ho.
Customer: Actual mein jo side mein jo maine aapko do teen complaint aur diya tha.
Customer: Aawaz aa rahi hai abhi?
Executive: Matlab piche se jyada shor aa raha hai. Hello.
Customer: Ha abhi aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ha abhi thoda thoda aa rahi hai boliye.
Customer: Mai yehi keh raha hu jo maine aapko complaint diya tha. Ji.
Customer: Uske do teen complaint kiya tha. Ek complaint nahi kiya tha ek complaint aur aur bhi do do teen complaint jo diya hai uske leke aap one second bhi aap dekhiye maine wo aapko bataya wo aapko do teen issue bola tha maine aap iske liye check kariye aur mujhe nahi yaad hai abhi kon sa lead tha mujhe wo yaad nahi hai. Aap aaye complaint karne aap.
Executive: Usi ke liye sir mai bol rahi hu wo jo aap bol rahe the ki lead aaiye wo char ghante pehle consume hui hai uska bhi mujhe ek do lead ka to ho jata hai dekhiye wo to hota hai technical issue. Par agar jyada aise lead aa rahi hai ki consume pehle hi ho rahi hai to uska mujhe ek data aapko pehle hi maine kal bataya tha ki wo data mujhe share karna hoga aage.
Customer: To ab aap abhi mujhe uske baare mein mujhe yaad nahi hai aur naya aayega to mai de dunga aapko theek hai. Aap jo maine complaint kiya uske aap check karo.
Executive: Wo to sir us pe to fir ye hoga na wahi cheez aapne mujhe do ka bheja tha screenshot sirf.
Customer: Ha jitna aayega mai uska screenshot aapko leta rahunga aap wait kariye theek hai.
Executive: Ha. Theek hai to aap next time jo bhi ho aap mujhe share karega abhi aapka ye concern mai close kar deti hu.
Customer: Ha ha group pe dal dunga theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap rupe dalega jaise jaise aapko problem aayi filhal ke liye mai aapka concern close kar deti hu.
Customer: Ab aapko jaise waisa lage concern to close karna hai aur aapko karna hai to kar lijiye.
Executive: Ha kyuki sir abhi to jaise aap bata rahe the abhi to theek aa rahi hai leads abhi aisa koi issue nahi hai. Jaise hi aapko dobara se wo to mera ho gaya lead wapas se mujhe to lead hua hai wo.
Customer: Ha to mai wahi bol rahi hu na dobara se agar aap same problem face karte hai to aap mujhe group pe ek baar screenshot share.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with buyleads.

- Customer does not remember how to share screenshots.

- Customer says leads are being consumed early.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the customer's complaints.

- Executive offered to close the concern for now.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share screenshots of issues in group.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaints, screenshots, technical issue
